channel.title: stella koh on stella koh
channel.description: Recent content in stella koh on stella koh

item.title: stella koh
item.description: Eunjeong (Stella) Koh Research Interests: Music Information Retrieval, Machine Learning for Audio/Music Applications, Sound Design, Auditory Perception & Cognition Education Sep 2016 – Ph.D. Student at Music, UC San Diego, CA 2012 – 2014. M.S. Engineering at Music & Audio Research Group, Seoul National University, South Korea (advisor: Kyogu Lee) 2008 – 2012. B.S. Computer Science and Engineering at Ewha Womans University, South Korea Experiences Jan 2017 - Dubbing Assistant at Music Department, UC San Diego, CA Sep 2016 - Dec 2016.

item.title: How to install Geppaku theme
item.description: Geppaku is bluish white theme for Hugo. It is color name in Japan. Chinese character is “月白”. 月白（げっぱく）とは、月の光を思わせる薄い青みを含んだ白色のことです。 via http://irocore.com/geppaku/ Geppaku is the white color including a thin blue that reminiscent of the light of the moon. (If that translate is wrong, please inform me using PullRequest.) Screenshot Index page (http://www.podsnack.com/musicstellak/a1jsdaqq) Post page Audio page Installation $ mkdir themes $ cd themes $ git clone https://github.com/masa0221/hugo-theme-geppaku hugo-theme-geppaku See the Hugo documentation for more information.
